NOVEMBER 1, 2021
CAMBRIDGE CITY COUNCIL.
(MEETING PROTOCOLS/COUNCIL ROLL CALL)
>> MAYOR SIDDIQUI: WITH THAT, ALL TONIGHT'S VOTES ARE BY ROLL CALL.
WE'LL OPEN PUBLIC COMMENT. FIRST PERSON THAT SIGNED UP IS PETER
SCOTT.

Public Comment

>> PETER SCOTT HAS NOT JOINED.
>> MAYOR SIDDIQUI: HEATHER HOFFMAN?
>> PARTICIPANT: HELLO. 213 HURLEY STREET. THE THING THAT I WANTED
TO ADDRESS IS THE FACT THAT THE AGENDA SEEMS TO HAVE BEEN THE
SUBJECT OF A HALLOWEEN TRICK. IT IS MISSING A WHOLE BUNCH OF STUFF.
